snippet: Once he got control of the ball and let his shot fly, Avery Bradley prepared to get mobbed....
lead_paragraph: Once he got control of the ball and let his shot fly, Avery Bradley prepared to get mobbed.

headline.main: Bradley's 3-Pointer at Horn Gives Celtics 104-103 Win
headline.print_headline: Bradley's 3-Pointer at Horn Gives Celtics 104-103 Win
